JSON Loader

Install

bash npm install --save-dev json-loader

⚠️ Since webpack >= v2.0.0, importing of JSON files will work by default. You might still want to use this if you use a custom file extension. See the v1.0.0 -> v2.0.0 Migration Guide for more information

Usage

Inline

js const json = require('json-loader!./file.json');

Configuration (recommended)

js const json = require('./file.json');

webpack.config.js js module.exports = { module: { loaders: [ { test: /\.json$/, loader: 'json-loader' } ] } }
